Content.Data: Please contact Security Innovation support for help upgrading your internal instance of TeamMentor. Security Innovation support experts will work with you to ensure a smooth upgrade. Please note that the structure for storing user credentials has changes (as explained later). Please contact Security Innovation [[/article/323dae88-b74b-465c-a949-d48c33f4ac85|support]] to import old users. The userâ€™s password will remain the same and the import will be transparent to the user
